ygData.subject: Re: Recent debate on level affecting melee.
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t forget the killing blow I supplied to your Ice Giant when I was a wee Bard of 21. ;) Operaman wee Bard of 24. Now only misses Ice Giants 98% of the time.
ygData.messageBody:
Don't forget the killing blow I supplied to your Ice Giant when I was a wee
Bard of 21. ;)

Operaman
wee Bard of 24. Now only misses Ice Giants 98% of the time.
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk

From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
Subject: Recent debate on level affecting melee.

Lately, I've been debating with a handful of people whether
level has anything to do with meleeing a NPC.
<snip>
All the tests I've run and experimented with were on lower level
characters, but I'm curious if the trend holds true to higher
levels.

What do you all think?

Harmonic.
